---
categories:
- HTML
tags:
- ‹input›
date:
- 2022-11-6 20:15:15
---

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
    <li><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">可以让你容易地创建一个方便输入年份或月份的一个</span></span><span
            style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">
                &lt;input&gt;</span></span><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">。</span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<table summary="" cellspacing="0"
    style="border-collapse:collapse; border-color:#a3a3a3; border-style:solid; border-width:1px; margin-left:32px"
    class=" cke_show_border">
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td
                style="background-color:black; border-bottom:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-left:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-right:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-top:1px solid #a3a3a3; vertical-align:top; width:.8833in">
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;"><span
                                style="color:white"><strong>属性</strong></span></span></span></p>
            </td>
            <td
                style="background-color:black; border-bottom:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-left:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-right:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-top:1px solid #a3a3a3; vertical-align:top; width:6.9451in">
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;"><span
                                style="color:white"><strong>说明</strong></span></span></span></p>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td
                style="border-bottom:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-left:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-right:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-top:1px solid #a3a3a3; vertical-align:top; width:.8833in">
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">value</span></span></p>
            </td>
            <td
                style="border-bottom:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-left:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-right:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-top:1px solid #a3a3a3; vertical-align:top; width:6.9451in">
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">DOMString
                        </span><span style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">表示输入输入的月份和年份的值，格式为</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"> YYYY-MM</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">。</span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">此输入类型使用的月份字符串的格式在</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"> HTML </span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">中使用的日期和时间格式中的有效本地月份字符串的格式中进行了描述。</span></span>
                </p>
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">可以设置一个默认的属性值插入到</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"> value </span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">里</span></span></p>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td
                style="background-color:#e7e6e6; border-bottom:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-left:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-right:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-top:1px solid #a3a3a3; vertical-align:top; width:.8833in">
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">max</span></span>
                </p>
            </td>
            <td
                style="background-color:#e7e6e6; border-bottom:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-left:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-right:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-top:1px solid #a3a3a3; vertical-align:top; width:6.984in">
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">要接受的最新年份和月份，采用上面</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">“</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">值</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">”</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">部分中讨论的字符串格式。如果输入到元素中的值超过此值，则元素无法通过约束验证</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"> (en-US)</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">。如果</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"> max </span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">属性的值不是</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">“yyyy-MM”</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">格式的有效字符串，则该元素没有最大值。</span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">此值必须指定晚于或等于</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"> min </span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">属性指定的年月配对</span></span></p>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td
                style="border-bottom:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-left:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-right:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-top:1px solid #a3a3a3; vertical-align:top; width:.8833in">
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">min</span></span>
                </p>
            </td>
            <td
                style="border-bottom:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-left:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-right:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-top:1px solid #a3a3a3; vertical-align:top; width:7.0138in">
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">接受的最新年份和月份，采用上述相同的</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">“yyyy-MM”</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">格式。如果元素的值小于此值，则元素无法通过约束验证</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"> (en-US)</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">。如果为</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"> min </span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">指定的值不是有效的年月字符串，则输入没有最小值。</span></span>
                </p>
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">此值必须是早于或等于</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"> max </span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">属性指定的年月配对</span></span></p>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td
                style="background-color:#e7e6e6; border-bottom:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-left:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-right:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-top:1px solid #a3a3a3; vertical-align:top; width:.8833in">
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">readonly</span></span></p>
            </td>
            <td
                style="background-color:#e7e6e6; border-bottom:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-left:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-right:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-top:1px solid #a3a3a3; vertical-align:top; width:6.9451in">
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">一个布尔属性，如果存在，则表示该字段不能由用户编辑</span></span>
                </p>
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;"><strong>注</strong></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">因为只读字段不能有值，所以</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"> required </span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">对同时指定了</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"> readonly </span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">属性的输入没有任何影响</span></span></p>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td
                style="border-bottom:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-left:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-right:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-top:1px solid #a3a3a3; vertical-align:top; width:.8833in">
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">step</span></span>
                </p>
            </td>
            <td
                style="border-bottom:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-left:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-right:1px solid #a3a3a3; border-top:1px solid #a3a3a3; vertical-align:top; width:6.9451in">
                <p><span style="font-size:11.5pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">对于月份输入，</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">step </span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">的值以月份为单位，比例因子为</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"> 1</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">（因为基础数值也以月份为单位）。</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"> step </span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">的默认值为</span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"> 1 </span><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">个月。</span></span></p>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
<p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;"><span
                style="color:#70ad47"><strong>示例</strong></span></span></span></p>
<table summary="" cellspacing="0"
    style="border-collapse:collapse; border-color:#a3a3a3; border-style:solid; border-width:0px; margin-left:32px"
    class=" cke_show_border">
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td
                style="background-color:white; border-bottom:0px; border-left:0px; border-right:0px; border-top:0px; vertical-align:top; width:5.9645in">
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;!DOCTYPE</span>&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">html&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;html</span>&nbsp;<span style="color:blue">lang</span><span
                                style="color:black">=</span><span style="color:maroon">"en"</span><span
                                style="color:blue">&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;head&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;meta</span>&nbsp;<span style="color:blue">charset</span><span
                                style="color:black">=</span><span style="color:maroon">"UTF-8"</span><span
                                style="color:blue">&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;meta</span>&nbsp;<span style="color:blue">http-equiv</span><span
                                style="color:black">=</span><span
                                style="color:maroon">"X-UA-Compatible"</span>&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">content</span><span style="color:black">=</span><span
                                style="color:maroon">"IE=edge"</span><span style="color:blue">&gt;</span></span></span>
                </p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;meta</span>&nbsp;<span style="color:blue">name</span><span
                                style="color:black">=</span><span style="color:maroon">"viewport"</span>&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">content</span><span style="color:black">=</span><span
                                style="color:maroon">"width=device-width,&nbsp;initial-scale=1.0"</span><span
                                style="color:blue">&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;title&gt;</span><span style="color:black">Document</span><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;/title&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;/head&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;body&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;form&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;label</span>&nbsp;<span style="color:blue">for</span><span
                                style="color:black">=</span><span style="color:maroon">"bday-month"</span><span
                                style="color:blue">&gt;</span><span
                                style="color:black">What&nbsp;month&nbsp;were&nbsp;you&nbsp;both&nbsp;in?</span><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;/label&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;input</span>&nbsp;<span style="color:blue">id</span><span
                                style="color:black">=</span><span style="color:maroon">"bday-month"</span>&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">type</span><span style="color:black">=</span><span
                                style="color:maroon">"month"</span>&nbsp;<span style="color:blue">name</span><span
                                style="color:black">=</span><span style="color:maroon">"bday-month"</span><span
                                style="color:blue">&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span
                            style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;/form&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;/body&gt;</span></span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri">&nbsp;</span></span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Comic Sans MS&quot;"><span
                                style="color:blue">&lt;/html&gt;</span></span></span></p>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>
<p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">&nbsp;</span></span></p>

            style="font-family:&quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;">浏览器运行结果如下：</span></span></p>

        src="data:image/png;base64,"
